trans-unit.source: Represents XML data stored in or retrieved from a server.

This class contains an instance of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>-derived type, and adds SQL-specific features such as database-style null semantics by implementing the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable> interface.
When you use SqlXml, the XML value that you assign to the SqlXml instance must be consumable by an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
For unicode data, the Byte Order Mark (`BOM`) must be present in the stream of data.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> instance.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> instance, supplying the XML value from the supplied <xref:System.IO.Stream>-derived instance.
A <xref:System.IO.Stream>-derived instance (such as <xref href="System.IO.FileStream"></xref>) from which to load the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> instance's Xml content.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> instance and associates it with the content of the supplied <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
If this value is null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the instance is set so that <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable.IsNull%2A> returns `true`.
An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>-derived class instance to be used as the value of the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> instance.
Gets the value of the XML content of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> as a <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
If the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> instance was initialized to null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), this method returns null.
A <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>-derived instance that contains the XML content.
The actual type may vary (for example, the return value might be <xref href="System.Xml.XmlTextReader"></xref>) depending on how the information is represented internally, on the server.
Attempt was made to access this property on a null instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref>.
Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
A string that indicates the XSD of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
Indicates whether this instance represents a null <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> value.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> is null.
Otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Represents a null instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> type.
A null instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> type.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.

An <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> that describes the XML representation of the object that is produced by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*> method and consumed by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*> method.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.
An XmlReader.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.
An XmlWriter
Gets the string representation of the XML content of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml"></xref> instance.
To retrieve the content represented as an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>, call the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml.CreateReader%2A> method.
The string representation of the XML content.
